sentences.en: "When you call me that, smile," the hero said to the bad man in that first of thousands of cowboy novels, Owen Wister's "The Virginian.
sentences.cn: “当你称呼我为牛仔，请微笑，”在欧文·威斯特的小说《弗吉尼亚州的人》中的英雄对坏蛋说到，这本小说是数以千计的有关牛仔小说中最早的一本。

sentences.en: He was Robert E. Lee. Lee was a Virginian and had served in the United States army for more than thirty years.
sentences.cn: 李是维吉尼亚人，他在美国军队中服役已有三十多年时间。

sentences.en: He was very proud of his old Virginian ancestry.
sentences.cn: 他对于他那久远的弗吉尼亚的家谱很引以自豪.

sentences.en: In June of 2004, he was also one of the surgeons who separated conjoined Virginian girls.
sentences.cn: 在2004年6月, 他也参与了一台分离手术,手术对象是一对来自弗吉尼亚的女孩.

sentences.en: Native West Virginian Julia Bonds understands these problems intimately.
sentences.cn: 来自西维吉尼亚的茱莉亚庞兹对这些问题丝毫不陌生.

sentences.en: The campaign worker, a naive Virginian, is an Indian descent.
sentences.cn: 那名男子是竞选工作者, 朴素的有印第安血统的弗吉尼亚人.

sentences.en: Two Virginian Congressmen sponsored the bill.
sentences.cn: 两位弗吉尼亚国会议员提出这一议案.

sentences.en: You might want to start with Owen Wister's tale about The Virginian.
sentences.cn: 欧文.魏斯特的[弗吉尼亚人]可能是很好的选择喔!
